---
title: Additional Functionality in Other Packages
engine: julia
---

```{julia}
#| collapse: true
progress = false
```


```{julia}
using MixedModels          
```

```{julia}
insteval = MixedModels.dataset("insteval")
ie1 = fit(MixedModel,
          @formula(y ~ 1 + studage + lectage + service + (1|s) + (1|d) + (1|dept)),
          insteval; progress)

```

```{julia}
ie2 = fit(MixedModel,
          @formula(y ~ 1 + studage + lectage + service +
                      (1 | s) +
                      (1 + service | d) +
                      (1 + service | dept)),
          insteval; progress)      
```


```{julia}
sleepstudy = MixedModels.dataset("sleepstudy")
```

```{julia}
ss1 = fit(MixedModel, @formula(reaction ~ 1 + days + (1|subj)), sleepstudy)
```

```{julia}
ss2 = fit(MixedModel, @formula(reaction ~ 1 + days + (1 + days|subj)), sleepstudy)
```


# MixedModelsExtras.jl

https://palday.github.io/MixedModelsExtras.jl/v2

```{julia}
using MixedModelsExtras
```

```{julia}
r2(ie2; conditional=true)
```
```{julia}
r2(ie2; conditional=false)
```


```{julia}
icc(ie2)
```

```{julia}
icc(ie2, :dept)
```
